definition: to freshen up/to be cautious or vigilant/to watch out/stimulant to enhance mental performance/stay-awake drug/agrypnotic
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to refresh and clear the mind (idiom)/invigorating/bracing

sentences.english: Clear green in the summer to make use of tropical iced tea, excellent refreshing effect.
sentences.chinese: 在夏季用熱帶清綠來製作冰茶，極佳的提神效果。

sentences.english: Of course, the sensory effects of coffee, and other warm beverages, like tea or cocoa, can lift your spirits.
sentences.chinese: 當然，咖啡和類似茶，可可等其它熱飲能提神。

sentences.english: I need my coffee to wake up my brain.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，咖啡可以提神醒腦。

sentences.english: Ahhh. Now go drink something strong, it's time to talk about posting.
sentences.chinese: 現在喝些提神的飲料，因爲我們要開始討論發帖了。

sentences.english: Go for fresh, organic fruit or a salad to get a quick pick-me-up.
sentences.chinese: 選擇新鮮，有機水果或沙拉就能迅速提神。

sentences.english: Yeah. Cold milk wakes me up.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，冰牛奶能使我提神醒腦。

sentences.english: Cold chocolate milk tastes pretty refreshing after a run.
sentences.chinese: 跑步之後喝冰鎮巧克力牛奶相當地提神。

sentences.english: She took a pill as a pick-me-up but it put her to sleep instead.
sentences.chinese: 她服了一片藥當作提神劑，但卻使她睡着了。

sentences.english: John: It's hard for me to wake up sometimes,too I usually rely on some strong coffee to help me.
sentences.chinese: 我有時候也很想睡覺，但我經常靠濃咖啡來提神。

sentences.english: One can refresh oneself through drinking the delicious and strong tea.
sentences.chinese: 如此喝茶，香高味釅，提神解渴。

sentences.english: And I usually refresh myself with a cup of tea.
Love is the greatest  refreshment in life.
sentences.chinese: 愛情是生活最好的提神劑。

sentences.english: Ice cream is a good refreshment on a hot day.
sentences.chinese: 冰淇淋在熱天是解暑提神的佳品。

sentences.english: Fresh flowers can lift someone's spirits, while dried flowers can be used to decorate homes.
sentences.chinese: 鮮花可以提神，而乾花可用於裝飾的家園。

sentences.english: This invigorating spice has an exotic reputation and stimulates endorphins.
sentences.chinese: 這種超級提神香料具有誘人美譽並能刺激內啡呔。

sentences.english: Jogging in the park peps you up.
sentences.chinese: 在公園裏慢跑可以爲你提神。

definition: to refresh and clear the mind (idiom)/invigorating/bracing
to calm (soothe) the nerves/to relieve uneasiness of body and mind
to dissipate the effects of alcohol
to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
to dissipate the effects of alcohol/to sober up
